settings.question: WHERE IS GAMEOLOGY BASED?
settings.answer: We are based in Melbourne Australia at 12 Eileen Road Clayton South 3169

settings.question: IS THE WAREHOUSE OPEN DIRECT TO THE PUBLIC?
settings.answer: Yes we have a retail store on site and sell direct to the public. For online purchases made selecting the store pick up option, we will prepare your order and send you an email confirmation when it is ready for pickup at no extra cost.

settings.question: WHAT HOURS IS YOUR RETAIL STORE OPEN?
settings.answer:
Mon-Wed 10:30am - 5pm
Thurs-Fri 10:30am - 6:00pm
Sat 12pm - 5pm
Sun Closed
*Contactless Click & Collect Only

settings.question: GAMEOLOGY NOTIFICATIONS
settings.answer:
We'll be keeping in touch via variety of methods including email, SMS and App Notifications. You have full control of how we communicate with you and you can alter these settings anytime.
There are several ways to opt out of communication from Gameology:
  • To stop receiving Gameology emails, click the Unsubscribe link at the bottom of any email.
  • To stop receiving any SMS, reply with STOP to and SMS we send you. Please note you will no longer receive SMS about any order if you do this.
  • To stop receiving Facebook Messenger Notifications, simply message unsubscribe to us via Facebook Chat.
Alternately you can contact our Customer Support Team for assistance.

settings.question: CAN YOU HOLD OR RESERVE AN ITEM FOR ME?
settings.answer:
Currently we are unable to reserve an item without payment.
If you are worried about an item going out of stock you can always contact our customer service team directly who will be able to advise you of our stock levels.

settings.question: WHAT PAYMENT METHODS DO YOU ACCEPT AT GAMEOLOGY?
settings.answer: The Gameology Online store currently accepts Visa, Mastercard, Afterpay & Zip Pay

settings.question: DO YOU PRICE MATCH AT GAMEOLOGY?
settings.answer: In certain cases we are able to offer a price match on a competitors pricing.  For more information about how to price match at Gameology please see our competitive pricing policy here.

settings.question: HAVE YOU RECENTLY MOVED OR WANT TO CHANGE YOUR DELIVERY DETAILS?
settings.answer:
If your order has processed too far through our warehouse or has been marked as shipped then this may not be possible, however, we still want to help so please let us know.

We recommend contacting our Customer Support team to ensure your details are updated before your order ships.

For more details of our cut-off times please see our shipping policy here.

settings.question: I WANT TO RETURN MY ITEM FOR A REFUND, HOW DO I DO THIS?
settings.answer:
We understand that customers will occasionally change their mind upon receiving their order, we are still able to organise a return of the items in order to process a refund for you as long as the following conditions are met:

  • The returned item(s) must be sealed and in brand new condition;
  • There must be proof of purchase(eg. receipt or order number);
  • Any return postage and initial postage will be covered by the buyer.
  • The return or refund request is within 30 days of the product being collected in store or dispatched from our warehouse for completed orders; and
  • The item is not a TCG or Trading Card Game item.

For more information on our returns policy please click here.

settings.question: THE ITEM I RECEIVED IS FAULTY OR DEFECTIVE, WHAT CAN I DO?
settings.answer:
At Gameology we want every gaming experience to be perfect for our customers but unfortunately there are rare cases where an item, due to a manufacturing error, is discovered as faulty.
This can include cases of:

  • Broken game pieces.
  • Missing game pieces.
  • And other similar occurrences that are assessed by Gameology on a case by case basis.

If you have received an item with a defect, please contact our customer service team here within 60 days of your purchase date.

For more information about out faulty items process please click here.

settings.question: CAN I CANCEL MY ORDER OR AFTER THE ORDER IS PLACED?
settings.answer:
In order to get your games on the table as soon as we can, we strive to process orders as quickly as possible and it is not always possible to halt an order once after it has been processed.

Please note that there is only a small window of time in which we can cancel an order or update a shipping address.

For our full cancellations policy please click here.

settings.question: HOW DO I SIGN UP FOR AN ACCOUNT?
settings.answer: Click here to join The Gameology Legion and start earning rewards points today!

settings.question: HOW DO I ACTIVATE MY ACCOUNT?
settings.answer:
Once you've signed up to The Gameology Legion online or instore you'll receive an email with a temporary password. Follow the instructions in the email to activate your account and you're ready to go!

If you run into any issues activating your account, contact our Customer Support Team.

settings.question: HOW DO I CHANGE THE EMAIL ADDRESS ON MY ACCOUNT?
settings.answer: In order to change the email address associated with the points on your account first you will need to make a new Gameology Legion Membership

settings.question: NEED YOUR PASSWORD RESET?
settings.answer:
To reset your Gameology Legion password, go here and enter the email address you used to sign up. You'll receive an email with a temporary password within 24 hours, simply follow the link and enter the temporary password and a new password for your account.

If you run into any issues resetting your password, contact the Customer Support team.

settings.question: EARNING POINTS AND LEVELLING UP
settings.answer:
You'll earn Legion Points for all instore and online purchases from Gameology made with your Gameology Legion account. There's a few chances throughout the year to grab even more bonus points, keep your eye out on our website, social media and make sure you have subscribed to the Gameology Newsletter

When you reach certain amounts of Points you'll Level Up! With each new level you'll get access to new and better perks and more. To learn more about what you get for leveling up go here.

If you are unable to use your Gameology Legion account with a purchase you can contact our Customer Support Team directly with proof of purchase and we will apply the points to your account.

settings.question: WHAT IS CLICK AND COLLECT?
settings.answer:
Click & Collect lets you shop our awesome product range online, and pick it up directly from our retail store.

When shopping online, choose Local Pickup during checkout.

When your Click & Collect order is ready for collection, we'll send you a notification.

settings.question: WHEN WILL MY CLICK AND COLLECT ORDER BE READY FOR PICKUP?
settings.answer: Provided that all items are in stock and your order contains no pre orders that are yet to be release we will send you an email notification that your order is ready to be picked up the next business day.

settings.question: AM I ABLE TO PICK UP MY CLICK AND COLLECT ORDER THE SAME DAY I MAKE IT?
settings.answer:
Yes you can, however, as we have not had time to pre prepare the order for you there will be a short wait (approximately 5 minutes) while our staff collect and prepare your order in our warehouse.

In order to make this process as quick and easy as possible for you we ask that you bring your order number with you to provide to our staff member in store.

settings.question: IS THERE ANYTHING ELSE I NEED FOR MY CLICK AND COLLECT ORDER?
settings.answer: We ask that everyone provide us with a form of identification (typically a drivers licence) so that we can verify the order collection.

settings.question: CAN SOMEONE ELSE COLLECT THE CLICK AND COLLECT ORDER THAT I MADE ONLINE?
settings.answer: Yes they can, we allow the collection of click and collect orders on behalf of someone else however in order to collect the order they will need to provide a form of identification (typically a drivers licence) so that we can verify the order collection.

settings.question: HOW LONG WILL MY CLICK AND COLLECT ORDER BE HELD AT THE STORE?
settings.answer: For Click & Collect orders, we can hold your purchase in-store for up to 14 days. After this time it may need to be cancelled; if this happens, you will be notified and your order refunded back to the original payment used to make the order less any applicable Afterpay & Zip Pay fees.

settings.question: CAN I CANCEL A CLICK AND COLLECT ORDER AFTER I HAVE MADE IT?
settings.answer: Yes you can, your order is still able to be cancelled as per our cancellation policy detailed here.

settings.question: HOW DOES AFTERPAY WORK?
settings.answer:
With Afterpay, you can have your products shipped or picked up with Click & Collect right now, but pay over four equal fortnightly installments, interest free!

For example, if you spend $100, each installment of $25 would be deducted from your credit or debit card each fortnight. If your order is eligible, Afterpay will be shown as a payment method in the checkout.

For more information, Please visit our Afterpay Page.

settings.question: WHAT CAN AFTERPAY BE USED ON?
settings.answer: Afterpay can be used on orders of minimum $200 and up to to $1,000.00, inclusive of shipping.

settings.question: WHAT IS ZIP?
settings.answer:
Zip is an easy and flexible payment method which gives you the freedom to buy now and pay later. Repayments are flexible to suit your lifestyle - weekly, fortnightly or monthly, and you can pay as much as you like as long as you meet your minimum monthly repayments, which is advised at the time of sign up.

Find out more Please visit our Zip Page

settings.text: Order today and your item will be dispatched on the next business day
